    • Method Detail

      • testCall

        public void testCall()
              throws java.io.IOException,
                     FileFormatException
        Tests LineParallelLife.call().

        call() computes the next generation for a single line of the board.

        Throws:
        FileFormatException - if pattern file is incorrectly formatted.
        java.io.IOException - if there is an I/O error.

      • testAge

        public void testAge()
             throws java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException,
                    java.io.IOException,
                    FileFormatException
        Tests LineParallelLife.age().

        age is tested using the small pattern file blinker.patt which is a period 2 oscillator.

        Throws:
        java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException - if age() times out.
        FileFormatException - if pattern file is incorrectly formatted.
        java.io.IOException - if there is an I/O error.

      • testWrap

        public void testWrap()
              throws java.io.IOException,
                     FileFormatException,
                     java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException
        Tests the copy-edge wrapping of LineParallelLife.

        Wrapping is tested with the small pattern file toadWrap.patt which behaves as a period 2 oscillator on a 5x5 board.

        Throws:
        FileFormatException - if pattern file is incorrectly formatted.
        java.io.IOException - if there is an I/O error.
        java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException - if age() times out.
